item.title: The Great Gatsby Long and Difficult Sentences
item.description: 《了不起的盖茨比》 (The Great Gatsby) 是 F. Scott Fitzgerald 的经典小说，以其精美的语言和复杂的句子结构著称。以下是几个典型的长难句，并对其结构和含义进行讲解。 1. 第一章中的长难句 原文： “In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I’ve been turning over in my mind ever since. ‘Whenever you feel like criticizing > any one,’ he told me, ‘just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had.’” 讲解： 句子结构：这个句子由两部分组成。第一部分是“In my younger and more vulnerable years”（在我年轻且更容易受到伤害的岁月里），这部分是时间状语，说明了动作发生的时间。第二部分是主要句子“My father gave me some advice that I’ve been turning over in my mind ever since.
